text: haey yeung ban banhchoun khyalpyouh da khlangokla bk baok towleu puokke knongorypel cheachraen thngai b nd banteabknea daembi yeung aoy puokke phloksa tearounakamm da ameasa knong karorsanow leu lokey nih . rie tearounakamm now thngai barlok vinh ku ameasa cheang nih towtiet haey puokke min trauv ban ke chuoy laey
